about_the_game:
Set off on an adventure into forests and plains with the Fantasy Dreamland - Traveler Pack! ELV Games has another addition to their pixel art Fantasy Dreamland series, this time with tiles sized for Ace and MV/MZ that are ready to help you build incredible exteriors for your heroes to explore!

A1, A2, 3 A5, and 6 B sheets are ready to turn your ideas into reality! Choose from brown and gray stone to build your castles, or mix and match them to show that this area needed to use whatever they could get their hands on to finish their outer walls.

This pack also includes 14 character sprites for doors and objects to add more life and possible puzzles to your game! Check out the Fantasy Dreamland - Traveler Pack and add new forts and castles to your game’s wilderness!

Contents:

Grasslands tileset:

- Grasslands tiles for your game!
- Animated fire monuments!
- Animated stone monuments!
- Multiple types of auto tiles!
- Flowers, Plants, Stones props!
- Mountains and cliff walls!
- Cave entrance!
- Stone monuments!
- 2 types of trees!
- Lots of props!

Castle tileset:

- Castle tiles for your game!
- Animated torches!
- Animated spiked door!
- Animated doors!
- Multiple types of auto tiles!
- Banners!
- Windows!
- Lots of props!

Extra Characters:

- 10 Character Sprites!
- 4 Direction Walk Animation!
- 4 Direction Idle Animation!
